channel.title: EvolutionRsc
channel.description:
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/54f2iq.jpg[/img]
EvolutionRsc is an RSPS, only reason i created this because sick of seeing servers die within a week because the creator cannot afford hosting or anything like that, not everybody wants to play RSCEmulation so here is a server hosted 24/7 for anybody who wants to play it.
There will be not much customisation although I'm willing to compromise if i get a decent sized userbase who want customisations such as a clan/party system or a task system, as the project goes along. I have used alot of the xml's from RSCA so there is a fair bit done. My main aim is create a decent economy because without one a server won't last as far as I'm concerned. Exp Rates are RSC replicated with a multiplier of x15, drops and rates [b]should[/b] be rsc like, however may need to tweak the percentage drop rates.
WARNING: There is no [b]easy[/b] money making options. You want to make money? You Beg/Mine-Smith/Fish etc.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Latest Dedicated Server Upgrades:
6 Additional Ip Addresses Secureport DDos Protection. (all ddos only works to an extent - what you pay for is what you get.)
Server Updates:
Update List =========== 1. Old mining methods removed. 2. Mining has been completely re-wrote. 3. Fishing has been re-wrote. It will now be batched. 4. F2 menu toggle created for the pk menu. 5. Dragon Half Shield binding implemented. 6. Ranging through walls has been fixed. 7. Maging through walls has been fixed. 8. F3 menu toggle created for the fog of war. 9. Up and down arrow keys modified to zoom in and out. 10. NPC scripting feature added. 11. Command added to reload the npc scripts. 12. Fatigue position moved in the stats menu. 13. Range removed from the equipment stats. 14. Slayer added into the stats menu. 15. Slayer crystal added with the item ID of 1329 16. Necessary slayer methods coded. 17. SlayerHandler class created to handle the slayer crystal and any other slayer methods that may be needed. 18. Task Master npc added with the npc ID of 798 19. Task Master npc wrote. 20. Ability to buy another slayer crystal from the Task Master added.
Binding both halfs of dragon square
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2i0yr87.png[/img]
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/epemc4.png[/img]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2q3svbd.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2uoqmty.png[/img]
New Slayer Skill:
[ul]This system basically works like this:
[*]Everyone's first slayer task will be "Chickens" with a 2,500 coin reward and 250 slayer experience [*]The amount you have to kill is randomized, along with the experience you will receive and the amount of coins you will receive. [*]Everybody will get their first slayer crystal for [b]free[/b] ~ if you happen to lose that crystal, you will have to pay 10,000 coins for another one - this is not compulsory, the crystal is there so you can keep track of your current task, as well as seeing general slayer information [*]The system is currently slayer level based. The higher your slayer level, the harder the NPCs you will have to kill - this can be altered if need be, I wrote it like this as a base for me to work with
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/dy7jnr.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/o5ng3q.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/s6j1px.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/t4v8zt.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/xeomf.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/33y5hdi.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2j64o7o.png[/img]
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2vagxld.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/kspbr.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/j8gs9l.png[/img]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/r2p8bt.png[/img]
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/21d4l14.png[/img]
[img]http://i42.tinypic.com/qpl6l5.png[/img]
Credits to Yong-min Lee ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Server is Online
New Client 03/04/2012 http://uppit.com/w8tw4t48t6lg/RSCEvo.zip
Alt Link - http://www.mediafire.com/?cf8b63u4ue3z96h
NEW CLIENT DOWNLOAD There was nothing wrong with that last one, just absolutely buggy as hell! it was the moparclassic compressed into .exe[/ul]
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Recorded Events:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BqeXZ-Ji1aU
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B7UTJ4WGAhI
